item.description:
NE Patriot Summer Training Camp
The Hall | Dinner & Drinks

This is a serious NO MISS!!
Come see the NE Patriots practice at Gillette. Maybe we can even snag an autograph! The Pats practice from 3:45 to 5:30 pm and your admission is FREE.

Following our Summer Training Camp viewing and autograph session, we will head over to The Hall at Patriots Place www.patriot-place.com/thehall. This is an awesome "museum" of sorts which will create goose bumps - I promise! The cost is only $10 and is more then worth it.

After The Hall we will head to Bar Louie (www.patriot-place.com/barlouie) for dinner and drinks.

It will be a fantastic day. If you can't make all of the festivities, come for what you can, please just note in your RSVP.

Rain: cancellation only if practice is cancelled. If so, rain date is Sunday, 8/2. Call the Patriots Summer Camp hotline for updates 508-549-0001 or me if unsure.

Were to meet: Enter the P6 entrance and head for parking around the back of Gillet Stadium. This is opposite of the North Retail Center where CBS is. The entrance is by the concessions, which will be open. You'll also not doubt see a crowd.

The bleachers hold 3,000 people and another 2,000 on the lawn so I will probably head there early to secure a place in line. Depending on crowd size either look for me on line or call me 508-415-0590.

Please try to be on time so we can all enjoy the event.
item.name: NE Patriots Summer Training Camp
